Rochester, Minnesota
Dear Phil:
div1.p:
The officials of the Southern Medical Association are going to give a
small luncheon on January 23rd at the Hotel Nacional in Havana. At this
luncheon will be the professor who will introduce you on the 25th. It is
hoped, Phil, that you will be able to sit by this professor. He has not
as yet been chosen by the faculty of the University of Havana, but will be
soon.

At first we decided to have the wives at this luncheon but it so hap-
pened that in conversing with a couple of them, they said they wanted a little
time to see some of the shops and the best time to do it was when we had the
men busy. Therefore, it was decided to give a stag luncheon and thus give
the wives a break.
div1.closer: Sincerely yours, Tom D. Spies, M.D. TDS:el
